resource.name: Cancer Observation Method ValueSet
resource.description: Methods used to derive cancer observations such as histopathology, imaging, immunohistochemistry.

resource.name: Cancer Stage ValueSet
resource.description: ValueSet for cancer stages commonly used in Kenya, e.g., Stage I–IV or TNM classifications.

resource.name: ECOG Performance Status
resource.description: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status.

resource.name: ECOG Performance Status
resource.description: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) Performance Status codes.

resource.name: ECOG Performance Status
resource.description: Standard ECOG performance status codes used to assess patient functional status.

resource.name: ICD-O-3 Morphology
resource.description: Morphology code from ICD-O-3 to describe the tumor histology.

resource.name: ICD-O-3 Topography Code
resource.description: ICD-O-3 topography code to describe the primary site of the tumor.

resource.name: Oncology Implementation Guide for Kenya (Oncology-IG-Kenya)
resource.description:
This Implementation Guide demonstrates how HL7® FHIR® can be leveraged to enhance oncology care in Kenya. It includes standardized profiles such as OncologyKenyaPatient and OncologyObservationKenya, tailored search parameters, and extensions reflecting Kenya's SHA and health system realities.

It is developed independently by a Kenyan health tech enthusiast to stimulate innovation, interoperability, and alignment with national cancer priorities.

resource.name: Oncology Kenya Condition
resource.description: A Condition profile for structured oncology diagnosis documentation in Kenya, aligned with national cancer registry reporting and HL7® FHIR® standards.

resource.name: Oncology Kenya Coverage
resource.description: Defines insurance and reimbursement details under SHA in Kenya, ensuring financial tracking and integration with NCCP Data Systems.

resource.name: Oncology Kenya Diagnostic Report
resource.description: Defines pathology and laboratory reports for oncology patients in Kenya, integrating with DHIS2 and cancer registries.

resource.name: Oncology Kenya MedicationRequest
resource.description: Oncology-specific medication request profile for Kenya, integrating with SHA, DHIS2, and Oncology Dispensing Tool (ODT).

resource.name: Oncology Kenya Patient
resource.description: Customized patient profile for oncology care in Kenya. This profile is part of the Oncology Implementation Guide for Kenya (Oncology-IG-Kenya) — a draft version (0.1.0) dated 2025-06-18. It models key patient elements aligned with Kenya’s national cancer registry, SHA (Smart Health Authority), DHIS2, and local care workflows. This guide demonstrates how HL7® FHIR® can be applied to transform cancer care, from screening to palliative support. It is a proof-of-concept created independently by a Kenyan digital health enthusiast, with no official endorsement, to inspire innovation using open health standards and locally relevant data modeling.

resource.name: Oncology Kenya Registry Report
resource.description: Defines structured cancer registry reporting format for Kenya, integrating with KEMRI Cancer Registry, Nairobi Cancer Registry, and DHIS2.

resource.name: Oncology Observation Kenya
resource.description: Observation profile for cancer-related data elements in Kenya's oncology care, supporting reporting, staging, diagnosis, and national registry alignment.

resource.name: Patient Education Level
resource.description: The highest level of education attained by the patient.

resource.name: Patient Occupation
resource.description: The current or most recent occupation of the patient.

resource.name: Registry Reporting
resource.description: Flag to indicate observation should be reported to the cancer registry.

resource.name: Search by Cancer Stage
resource.description: Filter patients by cancer staging captured in an Observation

resource.name: Search by Cancer Type
resource.description: Filter patients by cancer diagnosis (Condition.code)

resource.name: Search by County
resource.description: Allows filtering patients by County (address.state)

resource.name: Search by Date of Birth
resource.description: Filter patients by date of birth

resource.name: Search by Education Level
resource.description: Allows filtering patients by Education Level extension

resource.name: Search by Facility UPI
resource.description: Allows filtering patients by Facility UPI

resource.name: Search by Gender
resource.description: Filter patients by biological sex

resource.name: Search by National ID
resource.description: Filter patients by Kenyan National ID

resource.name: Search by Occupation
resource.description: Allows filtering patients by Occupation extension

resource.name: Search by SHA ID
resource.description: Allows filtering patients by SHA ID

resource.name: Search by Sub-County
resource.description: Filter patients by sub-county (address.district)

resource.name: Top Common Cancers in Kenya - ICD-10
resource.description: ICD-10 codes for the most common cancers in Kenya as per national strategy.

resource.name: Tumor Marker ValueSet
resource.description: Tumor markers used in Kenyan oncology diagnostics.
